result.execSummary:
The defendant Nicholas R. Elliott was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct [Modifiers: Domestic Abuse], a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

ADDRESS INFO for Nicholas R. Elliott
Current: 1600 West Seminary St  Apt 10, Richland Center, WI 53581 United States  (Effective: 09-03-2015)
Prior: 24590 Gerald Ln., Richland Center, WI 53581 United States
RCSD - Disposition of Warrant and Commitment (time served)

ADDRESS INFO for Nicholas R. Elliott
Current: 24590 Gerald Ln., Richland Center, WI 53581 United States  (Effective: 03-18-2015)
Prior: 181 W Seminary St, Richland Center, WI 53581 United States

Defendant Nicholas R. Elliott in court with attorney Lisa A McDougal. Prosecuting Atty Amy Forehand appeared for State of Wisconsin.  2 cases called together:  14CM41/sentencing after revocation and 15CM38/status.

Atty. M informs the Court that the parties have reached an agreement to resolve both cases.  In 14CM41, Atty. M states counsel are jointly requesting what was recommended in revocation summary - 90 days jail for single count of dc.  For 15CM38, Atty. M states counsel jointly recommend sentence of 30 days jail, consecutive to sentence in the revocation case/14CM41.

15CM38 - proceeding to plea/sentencing, Def pleads no contest.  Court's colloquy on plea.  Finding of guilty.  

ADA Forehand addresses the Court.  Court addresses Def.

Court follows joint recommendation.  14CM41 - Court sentences def to the max. in jail - 90 days.  15CM38 - 30 days jail, consecutive, with huber.  Pay costs of action.  Credit for time served:  23 days on 14CM41.  All costs to be collected by Clerk of Court and to include d.a. surcharge in 15CM38.
Atty. McDougal has requested that the April 22nd status in this case be moved up and set for same date/time as def's sentencing after revocation hearing in 14CM41

ADDRESS INFO for Nicholas R. Elliott
Current: 181 W Seminary St, Richland Center, WI 53581 United States  (Effective: 03-06-2015)
Prior: 24590 Gerald Lane, Richland Center, WI 53581

Defendant Nicholas R. Elliott in court, in custody, with attorney Lisa A McDougal. Prosecuting Atty Jennifer M. Harper appeared for State of Wisconsin.  Atty. M waives formal reading of the complaint and enters NG plea on def's behalf.  Status requested and set.  Status conference scheduled for April 22, 2015 at 09:00 am.

Bond amended: No contact with Katrina M. Honer's residence. Defendant is not to possess or consume alcohol.  Must submit to testing of blood, breath 
or urine on demand by law enforcement to monitor compliance. Defendant is not to enter into any bars/taverns or establishment where the sale of alcohol is the primary business.

Defendant Nicholas R. Elliott in court with Atty McDougal. Prosecuting Atty Amy Elizabeth Forehand appeared for State of Wisconsin. DA states the charges/possible penalties. Court will reset this matter for AIA. ADA Forehand states victim requests revision of the no-contact provision. No objection. Bond will prohibit contact with victim's residence. No alcohol provisions will continue.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for March 6, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
